item.title: 就业数据疲软引发降息乐观情绪，标普500指数反弹
item.description: 周一早盘，美国股市走高，因为上周最新的就业数据显示就业增长大幅放缓，从而提升了美联储将降息以支持经济的预期。【原文：US stocks advanced early Monday after the latest employment data last week showed a sharp slowdown in job growth, lifting expectations the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates to support the economy.】

item.title: 列支敦士登 LGT 投资后，Teneo 估值 23 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，列支敦士登王室支持的一家基金正在收购通信和咨询公司 Teneo 的少数股份。【原文：A fund backed by Liechtenstein’s Princely Family is taking a minority stake in communications and consulting firm Teneo, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 调查显示欧佩克产量稳定，沙特的限制抵消了阿联酋的增长
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，由于沙特阿拉伯的减产部分抵消了阿拉伯联合酋长国的进一步增产，欧佩克上个月的原油产量保持稳定。【原文：OPEC’s crude production remained steady last month as a pullback by Saudi Arabia partly offset a further boost by the United Arab Emirates, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 泽西城车站火灾后 PATH 列车服务暂停
item.description: 据港务局发言人称，周一早些时候，新泽西州泽西城的一个车站发生火灾，导致港务局 PATH 系统的两条线路停运。【原文：Two lines on the Port Authority’s PATH system were suspended after a fire started earlier Monday morning at a station in Jersey City, New Jersey, according to a spokesperson for the bi-state agency.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金配置者看好欧洲市场
item.description: 今年上半年，贸易裂痕震撼了全球市场，对冲基金投资者现在将欧洲资产列为首选。【原文：After trade rifts rocked global markets in the first half of the year, hedge fund investors now have European assets at the top of their list.】

item.title: Palantir 股价暴涨 525% 使首席技术官希亚姆-桑卡尔成为公司第五位亿万富翁
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 在过去一年中势不可挡的涨势为投资者带来了超过六倍的收益，也为其创始人和早期员工创造了巨额财富。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc.’s unstoppable rally the past year has yielded more than sixfold gains for investors, and created monumental wealth for its founders and early employees.】

item.title: 被 "烧伤 "的信贷投资者在清理和重整债务中找到慰藉
item.description: 陷入困境的债务投资者正纷纷采用一种新策略，从陷入困境的公司中赚钱。【原文：Distressed debt investors are piling into a new strategy to make money from troubled companies.】

item.title: 亚马逊将关闭 Wondery 播客工作室，重组音频业务
item.description:
随着播客逐渐以视频为导向，Amazon 正在将 Wondery 整合到 Audible 和一个新的 "创作者服务 "团队中，同时裁员约 110 人

。【原文：

As podcasting becomes video-oriented, Amazon is shuffling Wondery into Audible and a new “creator services” team while cutting approximately 110 staff members

】

item.title: 取消房屋资本利得税将使加州富人受益
item.description:
唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提出了一个想法，支持者称这将有助于释放冻结的房地产市场库存。但数据显示，受益者主要是富人。【原文：

President Donald Trump has floated an idea supporters say would help unlock inventory in the frozen housing market. But data show the benefits would accrue primarily for the wealthy.

】

item.title: 花旗银行在阿波罗交易之外扩大私人信贷网络，并设立新职位
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）将在数万亿美元的私人信贷市场上撒下更大的网，新招聘的一名员工将在其与阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. is casting a wider net in the multitrillion-dollar private credit market with a new hire who will source debt deals beyond the scope of its existing tie-up with Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 私人资产热潮降温，对冲基金和加密货币吸纳数十亿新资金
item.description: 私募股权和信贷曾经是华尔街最可靠的现金磁石，但它们的筹资速度正在放缓，而对冲基金和加密货币策略在另类投资领域的发展势头正日益强劲。【原文：Fundraising for private equity and credit — once Wall Street’s most reliable cash magnets — is slowing, while hedge funds and crypto strategies are gaining momentum in the world of alternative investments.】

item.title: 瑞士准备向美国提出更具吸引力的贸易提议
item.description: 在上周美国宣布对瑞士出口产品征收 39% 的关税后，瑞士政府表示，它决心在贸易问题上战胜美国。【原文：The Swiss government said it is determined to win over the US on trade after last week’s shock announcement of 39% tariffs on exports to America.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，即使石油价格下滑，沙特阿拉伯也已足够削减开支
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织称，沙特阿拉伯今年已经削减了足够多的开支，即使原油价格疲软，可能也不需要进一步进行财政调整。【原文：Saudi Arabia has cut spending enough this year and probably won’t need to make further fiscal adjustments even if crude oil prices weaken, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 瑞士黄金交易成为与特朗普贸易谈判的焦点
item.description: 促使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对瑞士进口商品征收巨额关税的贸易不平衡，是由世界黄金市场中心的一个小行业推动的。【原文：The trade imbalances that prompted President Donald Trump to slap hefty levies on Swiss imports have been driven by a small industry at the center of the world’s gold market.】

item.title: Spotify 宣布提价后股价大涨
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 的股价在盘前交易中上涨，此前该公司宣布将提高美国以外许多市场的高级订阅价格。【原文：Spotify Technology SA shares gained in premarket trading after the company announced it’s raising premium subscription prices across many markets outside the US.】

item.title: CoinDesk 所有者 Bullish 寻求通过 IPO 筹集最多 6.29 亿美元资金
item.description: Bullish 是一家数字资产交易所运营商和媒体 CoinDesk 的所有者，它希望在美国首次公开募股中筹集多达 6.293 亿美元的资金。【原文：Bullish, a digital-asset exchange operator and owner of media outlet CoinDesk, is looking to raise as much as $629.3 million in its US initial public offering.】

item.title: 加纳将可可种植者的薪酬提高 4.2%，此前塞地有所上涨
item.description: 加纳将支付给农民的可可价格提高了 4.2%，因为当地货币的升值限制了更大的涨幅。【原文：Ghana raised the amount it pays farmers for their cocoa by 4.2% as the local currency’s appreciation limited the scope for a bigger increase.】

item.title: Lyft 与百度合作开发 Robotaxis，拓展欧洲市场
item.description: Lyft 公司表示，它将与中国百度公司合作，从明年开始在欧洲推出自动驾驶汽车，这项协议是在这家美国共享出行公司敲定首次进军欧洲大陆之后达成的。【原文：Lyft Inc. said it’s partnering with China’s Baidu Inc. to launch autonomous vehicles in Europe starting next year, an agreement that comes after the US rideshare company finalized its first expansion into the continent.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"供应压轴戏预示石油市场新谜团
item.description:
该集团表示可能会延长、暂停或扭转近期产量激增的趋势。【原文：

The group signaled it could extend, pause or reverse its recent output surge.

】

item.title: 波多黎各私募股权投资热潮面临新的监管审查
item.description: 波多黎各新任金融监管机构正在加强对该岛蓬勃发展的私募股权投资行业的审查，在此之前，她的办公室最近关闭了该岛最大的私募股权投资公司之一。【原文：Puerto Rico’s new financial regulator is stepping up scrutiny of the island’s booming private equity industry, after her office recently shutdown one of the island’s largest players.】

item.title: 弗洛里斯风暴袭击苏格兰，英国电价出现负增长
item.description: 由于弗洛里斯风暴以飓风级阵风袭击苏格兰和北部地区，英国周二的电价骤降至零度以下。【原文：UK electricity prices for Tuesday plunged below zero as Storm Floris lashes Scotland and the north with hurricane-force gusts.】

item.title: 泰森上调 2025 年展望，因为鸡肉抵消了牛肉的损失
item.description: 泰森食品公司（Tyson Foods Inc）在季度利润意外增长后上调了盈利预期，原因是美国鸡肉市场的繁荣继续抵消了牛肉业务的亏损。【原文：Tyson Foods Inc. raised its earnings forecast after quarterly profit unexpectedly rose as a boom in US chicken continues to offset losses in the beef business.】

item.title: 安费诺将以 105 亿美元收购 CommScope 宽带部门
item.description: CommScope Holding Co. 达成协议，以约 105 亿美元现金将其宽带和电缆设备部门出售给安费诺公司（Amphenol Corp.【原文：CommScope Holding Co. reached a deal to sell its broadband and cable equipment arm to Amphenol Corp. for about $10.5 billion in cash, the second such deal it’s done with Amphenol as part of a series of divestitures aimed at paying off debt.】

item.title: AMD 苏世民面临投资者高期望值的压力
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将探讨芯片制造商面临的压力，即如何满足被人工智能的可能性所吸引的投资者的高期望值。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King looks at the pressure on chipmakers to meet high expectations from investors enthralled by the possibilities of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战的新敌人是数据
item.description: 对大多数精通经济学的人来说，上周对唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税战来说并不是一个好的星期，尽管他誓言要推进另一次进口税上调，并将于本周四生效。【原文：To most people versed in economics, last week was not a good one for President Donald Trump’s tariff wars even as he vowed to push forward with another hike in his import taxes now set to take effect on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普为美国经济政治化开辟新战线
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注的是特朗普对美国经济机构的攻击。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. item.title: 创始人跳槽到大科技公司后，人工智能初创企业会发生什么？
item.description:
所谓的反向收购让曾经前途无量的初创企业陷入困境，剩下的员工只能自己想办法。【原文：

So-called reverse acquihires have left once-promising startups stranded, with remaining employees left to figure out what to do next.

】

item.title: 贸易风险和肥胖症药物的减速阻碍了礼来迈向 1 万亿美元的步伐
item.description: 一年前，礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.但它至今仍未突破这一上限。【原文：A year ago, Eli Lilly & Co. was poised to become the first pharmaceutical company to register a trillion-dollar market valuation. It still hasn’t cracked that ceiling.】

item.title: 投资者摒弃共产主义在智利大选中获胜的幻想
item.description: 一项月度调查显示，智利金融市场正在为极端保守派候选人何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特在今年的总统选举中获胜做准备，而执政联盟中一位共产党竞争者的崛起并没有使他们感到不安。【原文：Chile’s financial market is preparing for the victory of ultra-conservative candidate Jose Antonio Kast in presidential elections this year, unfazed by the rise of a communist contender in the ruling alliance, a monthly survey shows.】

item.title: 南非准备抵消特朗普关税影响的计划
item.description: 南非政府正在对旨在保护企业免受美国惩罚性贸易关税影响的总体方案进行最后的润色，并计划在本周晚些时候将其提交给立法者。【原文：South Africa’s government is putting the final touches to an overarching package that aims to shield businesses against the fallout from punitive US trade tariffs and plans to present it to lawmakers later this week.】
